author: gurukamath
content: In the context of EIP-2780, if the `tx.to` has a 7702 delegation, is it treated as contract and charged `COLD_ACCOUNT_COST_CODE = 2600`?

author: gurukamath
content: Looking to implement this EIP in EELS since it is CFI'd for Glamsterdam

author: gurukamath
content: Would be nice to have [this table](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/b913f5efcbbcf6b91ae906aab1416975adfc018a/EIPS/eip-2780.md?plain=1#L266) in the EIP updated to explicitly include 7702 delegations
